item.title: Dance Upon The Graves Of Your Enemies With This Brutal Diablo 4 Rogue Build
item.content:encoded:
https://kotaku.com/diablo-4-vessel-of-hatred-rogue-build-guide-1851691792

Welcome to my Rogue “Dance of Knives” build guide, where I’ll show you the build that made me fall in love with the Rogue class in Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred.

Beginner Leveling & Endgame Build - Rogue

Good news, Rogues! My favorite build in Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred is great for both leveling and endgame content.

If you’ve read my Spiritborn guide, you’ll already know I love movement, and this is the most movement-focused build I’ve found for the Rogue. Like an amped up ‘Whirlwind’ Barbarian build, the ‘Dance Of Knives’ Rogue build is all about using its signature ability as often as possible. It doesn’t take much to get it going, and once you do, it’s fairly easy to use it all the time.

The basic idea is to use abilities like Concealment, Dark Shroud, Shadow Clone, and others to boost your damage, then hold Dance of Knives until you run out of charges. Then use Blade Shift and other abilities, get your charges back, then begin again.

Read More: Destroy Everything In Sight With This Beginner Diablo 4 Barbarian Build

When picking up gear or modifying traits, ‘Movement speed’ is king. Enhanced Dance Of Knives will let you use the ability endlessly once you can move 30 meters during one use of it as it will continually refresh itself. Then, once you can hold Dance Of Knives and never run out of charges, you can start focusing on boosting Crit Chance, increasing Vulnerability, and other things to boost your damage even further.

With this build you’ll level quickly, easily, and spin right into the endgame, where you can keep the gravy train going as this build is more than lethal enough to keep you going for a long time.

Basic Skills

  • Blade Shift 1/5 - Fundamental Blade Shift

Core Skills

  • Stutter Step 3/3
  • Target Practice 3/3

Agility Skills

  • Dance Of Knives 5/5 - Disciplined Dance Of Knives
  • Unstable Elixirs 3/3
  • Trick Attacks 3/3
  • Weapon Mastery 3/3

Subterfuge Skills

  • Concealment 1/5 - Subverting Concealment
  • Exploit 3/3
  • Malice 3/3
  • Dark Shroud 1/5 - Countering Dark Shroud

Imbuement Skills

  • Shadow Imbuement 1/5 - Blended Shadow Imbuement

Ultimate Skills

  • Shadow Clone 5/5 - Supreme Shadow Clone
  • Second Wind 1/3
  • Haste 3/3
  • Aftermath
  • Unto Dawn
  • Impetus

Key Passive

  • Momentum

Now that you have every tool securely in your arsenal, make the forces of Hatred regret ever crossing you. Carry out your revenge (and take what you can) as you slink your way through Sanctuary, Wanderer.
